: : Rodimus Prime : : 
He nodded. 
Rodimus Prime: Yes, leave Nightlight out of it. Remember, if anything suspecious happens, Condor, inform me. 
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: Condor::

Condor nodded and tought "have I to tell him that we were speaking 
about Nightlight... I don't sure if we have to tell him... perhaps 
not, I have any proof against Flicker and he's inocent until I can 
proof that he's guilty..."and said "I will do it"


and COndor left the place.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: Ok. I want you to talk to him again. Try to get 
some answers. If he seems evasive of your questions, come get me.
>  airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Condor::
> 
> "My evidence is this"said condor while he showed a leaf "Flicker 
> said that I collapsed just outside the main doors, but the last 
> thing that I remember is that we left the Mess Hall... What happen 
> in that time?, plus I've seen this kind of leafs near of the 
forest 
> that is in the area and not near at base and all those fallen 
leafs 
> are dry and this is fresh... I can swear that this leaf isn't in 
my 
> wings when I was in Mess hall... but after I left Mess hall, I 
can't 
> remember a lot..." Condor paused and said serously "it isn't a 
proof 
> that Flicker is doing something wrong... but it's the evidence 
that 
> something isn't all right"
> 
> 
>
